JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Motivated employees to poultry production in Nibe
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
The Job

We are looking for new employees.

You will be a part of the production, which consists of a professional and energetic team with a big focus on delivering the best quality.

Your working tasks may be as follows:

  • Weigh and pack raw chicken in trays,
  • Sorting tasks
  • Other manual tasks

 

Personal qualifications:

 

You are motivated to work, thrive in active work, and have a positive approach to your work tasks. In addition, we expect you to:

  • be able to take a minimum of 2-5 shifts per week
  • to thrive in a sometimes-busy work environment
  • like work at a fast pace
  • speak Danish or English
  • have experience from similar work - but not a requirement.
  • You are able to work between 5-18 ( public transport is not the best)

 

Professional skills

• You have experience in production or packing - it is not a requirement.

• You are flexible according to working hours.

• You speak and understand Danish or English.

Are you interested?

Press apply and send your CV and application soon as possible.

We look forward hearing from you.
